name: Orghia Kulus
description:
Orghia Kulus is a simple game made by Gibki Kaktus. In that game we're unknown hero, who had lost memory and has been rescued by the hunter. We're completing his errands in order to requite for his help. Anyways, we're turning into significant.
It's meager 2D-shooter game based on breaking through the hord of enemies.

My website: www,dravisoft.com

My fanpage:http://www.facebook.com/Dravisoft
